channel.title: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
channel.description: I followed the manual and 1: set a new MAC for the new Workstation in VB 2. changed the last octet in /etc/network/interfaces In whonixcheck I still get ERROR: Tor Boosttrap Result: Tor's Control Port could not be reached. ... (Code: 255)

item.title: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
item.dc:creator: harakiri
item.description:
Solved. Problem was I left a # comment at the end of a line in /etc/network/interfaces which due to a bug returns an error.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation

item.title: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
item.dc:creator: harakiri
item.description:
Hi Patrick,
It’s imported one (wouldn’t want to clone a “used” one).

It’s a Whonix Workstation. I already used successfully a non Whonix OS with the gateway once in the past.

They are using the same internal network - Whonix.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation

item.title: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It’s really a “second Whonix-Workstation”, i.e. a cloned or imported one?

Or is it a Whonix-Custom-Workstation? (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems)

For the latter the instructions are different. (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Easy_2)

Did you make sure, that they are using the same internal network [font=arial]Whonix[/font]?

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation

item.title: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
item.dc:creator: harakiri
item.description:
[quote=“HulaHoop, post:4, topic:1230”]You need to change the second workstation’s IP too.[/quote]I changed only the second workstation’s internal IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
item.dc:creator: harakiri
item.description:
I followed the manual and
1: set a new MAC for the new Workstation in VB
2. changed the last octet in /etc/network/interfaces
In whonixcheck I still get ERROR: Tor Boosttrap Result: Tor’s Control Port could not be reached. … (Code: 255)

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get tor connection in a second Workstation
